items.name: Potion of Heroism
items.description: For 1 hour after drinking this potion, you gain 10 temporary hit points. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the bless spell (no concentration required).

items.name: Ring of the Ram
items.description: This ring has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can use an action to expend 1 to 3 of its charges to make a ranged spell attack against one creature you can see within 60 feet of you.
